name: Lake of Voices
description: A free horror Visual Novel about an ill-fated journey across Sinnlos, a lake where gruesome monsters lurk just beneath the surface. With times being so dire you'll need to decide what, and who, is going to be sacrificed. Anyone can be saved, but not everyone can be.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 1Ghz Memory: 520 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card Storage: 600 MB available space
